Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: B. Dalager "avgsuperheroine"
Reviews.Content: My parents purchased this camera, and we are so impressed with the features and quality of the camera that we are going to purchase it for ourselves now.  A great price for a really decent camera, great for taking pics of the kids with the stabilization feature.We compared this to two others quite extensively while shopping, and in this price range it had the best combination of features.  The software that comes with it is quite nice too.  I have photoshop, but the software is elaborate enough to file and store your photos and do just about all of the editing that you would need to do for home use.The menus also feature very user-friendly messages and notes, making this a great camera for my parents, who purchased this as their first digital camera.  The menus are easy to understand and to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Summer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! We looked at alot of cameras and this one was the best in the price range. We have a very active 2 year old and it takes wonderful pictures of him. My husband took a picture of our ceiling fan while it was moving and the picture came out clear, you couldnt tell that the fan was moving. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a decent priced camera.

Reviews.Title: Really nice
Reviews.Author: Ellie B
Reviews.Content: My sister bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas.  We are really impressed with it's quality.  I own a Canon A560 and I think the pictures taken with this camera are even nicer.  It's very user friendly and you can do some nice editing on the camera itself.  I am very impressed.  (And I have to be pretty impressed or not impressed to go out of my way to write a review).

Reviews.Title: So easy even you can use it.
Reviews.Author: charmaine "Charmaine"
Reviews.Content: HP Photosmart M547 6.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical ZoomThis is my second HP after 7 years.  HP was my choice again for the ease of use, ease of understanding theinstructions and ease of connecting to the printer and the MAC computer.  The screen is large, and what you see in the screen is the you picture get.For the price is was THE RIGHT CHOICE AGAIN  ----HP.Charmaine

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Barry Jordan "trey38"
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA PERFORMS WELL AND OUT PERFORMS SOME 8 PIXEL CAMERAS.IT STOPS MOTION REALLY WELL. MADE MY CEILING FAN AT FULL SPEED LOOK LIKE IT WAS STANDING STILL SO IMAGINE WHAT IT WILL DO AT THE GAME. vERY GOOD FOR THE PRICE.

Reviews.Title: HP photosmart M547.6  CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Ralph Slaughter
Reviews.Content: I love it I`ve own one for years they have always performed well , Takes wonderful pictures, Just point and shoot!!!!Great camera, easy to use. I recommend this camera for beginners

Reviews.Title: Great item at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Wanda Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I was looking for this camera, as my daughter-in-law had one and also had the printer dock to go with it, so it made it easy to print your pictures.  She ended up dropping the camera and breaking it, and then she got a different camera, so I really wanted to continue to use the dock to print my pictures, so I had to find the camera to go with the dock, and here it was on Amazon, and the price was fantastic!  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Good camera at an Affordable Price
Reviews.Author: repeat customer
Reviews.Content: The camera is used for taking individual children photos numerous times everyday. The camera always takes a good picture, in focus and captures lighting. I would recommend this camera for any novice through semi pro.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera to have!
Reviews.Author: 4paws
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for many years...I love how small it is, the pictures are great and it has video capability.  Unfortunately, I dropped it one day and cracked the door that protects the memory card and holds the batteries.  I actually put masking tape across it which was a pain to deal with but it still worked.  I have two digital Canon SLR cameras but I really like having a smaller camera to carry in my purse.  Last Christmas I bought a smaller Canon camera and was not happy with it so I exchanged it for a smaller Nikon camera and I'm still not happy with it either.  Today I decided to see if I could find another HP Photosmart M547 and I was shocked that I could still buy a new one!!  I have had such good luck with this little camera, that I immediately purchased another one.  I saw that they now have a M637 but I figured that I would stick with what I know and maybe eventually upgrade to that one.  If you don't have a good little camera, this is the one to buy!!  I take pictures all the time and I love this little camera!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good up grade from our older HP camera
Reviews.Author: GROG "GROG"
Reviews.Content: Camera was purchased as a refurb and it  works very well and is easy to use. We have had it for a few weeks and it is working fine. It was purchased as a up grade from a older model HP camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Gramma
Reviews.Content: The product was what I was looking for.  The only problem is that it did not come with a manual to show how the camera works and what the features were.

Reviews.Title: Not what we had hoped
Reviews.Author: maximum verbosity
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our son in March.  He only was able to use it a few times before the lense would no longer retract.  Unfortunately, we were on vacation for 3 weeks when it happened and the camera only had a 90 day warranty, which ran out while we were gone.  Now we have an expensive, useless camera.  I expected more from HP.

Reviews.Title: HP M547 Photosmart rated So So
Reviews.Author: W. F. Riley
Reviews.Content: The 6.2MP HP M547 Photosmart's not a bad utilitarian camera and good overall value for the $75 Online price, and the $9 2GB SD Card I got on Amazon using the Google Checkout discount was a great deal; But the 6.2 HP M547 Photosmart camera is not anywhere close to the camera my 4MP Nikon digital is.  Good thing I found my Nikon again.  I guess it's true, you get what you pay for, even if I did pay $200 for the 4MP Nikon 2 Chrismas' ago.

Reviews.Title: This is a 6.2 MP NOT A 8PM as advertised
Reviews.Author: James Lawson
Reviews.Content: When you actually receive the camera, it is not a 8 PM but a 6.2MP, which was a great disappoitment.  Everything advertises it as the 8MP including the receipt.  Truth of the matter is that it is mis-advertised on the website.  When we called to let them know and try to get the 8 PM we were told it was a mistake on the website and we could ship it back but would NOT be guaranteed a 8PM camera (basically they would have sent us the same camera).  Disappointing.
